title: Google\Cloud\Monitoring\V3\SpanContext
name: SpanContext
description:
The context of a span. This is attached to an [Exemplar][google.api.Distribution.Exemplar] in [Distribution][google.api.Distribution] values during aggregation.

It contains the name of a span with format: projects/[PROJECT_ID_OR_NUMBER]/traces/[TRACE_ID]/spans/[SPAN_ID]

Generated from protobuf message google.monitoring.v3.SpanContext

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.span_name
params.description: The resource name of the span. The format is: projects/[PROJECT_ID_OR_NUMBER]/traces/[TRACE_ID]/spans/[SPAN_ID] [TRACE_ID] is a unique identifier for a trace within a project; it is a 32-character hexadecimal encoding of a 16-byte array. [SPAN_ID] is a unique identifier for a span within a trace; it is a 16-character hexadecimal encoding of an 8-byte array.

methods.description:

[SPAN_ID] is a unique identifier for a span within a trace; it is a 16-character hexadecimal encoding of an 8-byte array.
